example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS لاحظ) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (PRON_3MS ه)) (PUNC ") (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN ظروف) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN عصيبة) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN متزايدة))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS استمر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يجدّ) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN لاضطلاع)) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN مسؤوليات) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))))))))) (PUNC ")))
